8. Trusts for My Children at 25
8.1 Subject to clause 7, my Trustees must hold the Trust Fund on trust for my children who are living at the Inheritance Date and who reach 25, in equal shares.
8.2 While a beneficiary under this clause 8 is under 25, my Trustees:
(i) may pay the income from the beneficiary's share of the Trust Fund to the beneficiary or use it for his or her benefit; and
(ii) subject to any exercise of my Trustees' power under clause i, must add to the beneficiary’s share of the Trust Fund any income from that share.
8.3 While a beneficiary under this clause 8 is under 25, my Trustees may pay some or all of the capital of the beneficiary’s share of the Trust Fund to the beneficiary or use it for his or her benefit.
8.4 If any child of mine dies before the Inheritance Date or before reaching 25, my Trustees must hold the share of the Trust Fund that they would have held for my child if my child had been living at the Inheritance Date and reached 25 on trust for my child's own children living at the later of the Inheritance Date or my child's death in equal shares absolutely. If my child had any child who died before him or her (my grandchild), my Trustees must hold the share of the Trust Fund that they would otherwise have held for my grandchild on trust for my grandchild's own children living at the later of the Inheritance Date and my grandchild’s death in equal shares absolutely, and so on for each subsequent generation.
